attributes.action: BRING BACK BRITISH CITIZENS FROM AUSTRALIA !
attributes.additional_details:
I fell like British Citizens have took a lot of responsibilities and tried so hard to find a way to fly back to their own families , some with luck some with none.
This event has took everyone by surprise , if I can say , and left us with not many option to survive abroad , we urge the UK government or whoever is on charge , to help us , to get us home back to our families ; as we would much rather be next to our family to give them support as much as we would love to support our country.
attributes.background:
We leaving our last hopes in the hands of the British government to find a solution and help as the many British citizens currently travelling or temporarily in the Australia territory.

Flights to the UK are either unavailable or a big financial and health risk to take , we need HELP !

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new government partnership with airlines to fly back more tourists stranded abroad: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-government-partnership-with-airlines-to-fly-back-more-tourists-stranded-abroad

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
